apiConnector.apiConnectorsPageDescription: $t(shared:project.name) creates an API client connector when you upload a valid OpenAPI 2.0 specification that describes the API you want to connect to.
apiConnector.createApiConnectorTip: Upload file or use URL to create API connector
apiConnector.emptyStateInfo: There are no currently available API connectors. Please click on the button below to create one.
apiConnector.showDetailsTip: Show the details of this API client connector
